name: AIE 2021 Festive Game Jam
description:
This year my friend Nicolas and I decided to participate in the 2021 AIE Festive Game Jam. Our idea for the game jam was a game about managing Santa's factory inspired by titles like Factorio and Satisfactory. Unfortunately we didn't get to complete the game but this is something I'd really like to come back to one day.

Controls: (It's very buggy! Sorry!)

WASD - Move Camera

Scroll - Zoom

Click on the edges of conveyor belts to extend them.

Click on buildings to select them.
